content: Is the notion of "active users" at https://github.com/zulip/zulip/blob/master/docs/users.md the same as the notion at /stats? I'm guessing not, but trying to make sense of the new "active users" stats.

We definitely need a comment on the /stats page, but it's the number of human users that have logged in in the last two weeks. (And in old versions of the stats page it was something else; roughly, the number of non-deactivated human users.)
@Josh Mandel
